title: un nAmAmudam
sahitya:
un nAmAmudam nalgum unaiyE enru urudiyuDan vanda enakkirangAdadEn (rAmA)


anupallavi

  anru vAnavarkkAi mandaram tAngi ninru vandamudam tanda enra ninnamudE


caraNam    eDutta avatArak-kaLaippil pArkkaDal paDu viDat-taravaNai paDuttAyO sharaN aDuttavarkku
 abhayam taruvEn enum shol viDuttAyO edir varak-kazhal kaDuttadO en vinai taDuttadO enrum
